abstract: Those of us who pay lip service to green living can now be more genuinely P.C. -- with the Dell Studio Hybrid PC, a computer with special power-saving features.
snippet: Those of us who pay lip service to green living can now be more genuinely P.C. -- with the Dell Studio Hybrid PC, a computer with special power-saving features.
lead_paragraph: Those of us who pay lip service to green living can now be more genuinely P.C.  with the Dell Studio Hybrid PC, a fashionably curvy computer with special power-saving features.

headline.main: A Green PC That’s Easier on the Electric Bill. The Bamboo Case Is Optional.
headline.print_headline: A Green PC That’s Easier on the Electric Bill. The Bamboo Case Is Optional.
